front.title: Draft American National Standard Instrumentation and Systems for Monitoring Airborne Radioactivity

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The complexity associated with quantitative assay and monitoring of aerosols and gasses can be substantial. This standard covers system design, manufacture, performance, testing, calibration, and maintenance requirements for noble gases, aerosols (including transuranics), tritium, and radioiodides.
